Plot: A depressed musician reunites with his lover, though their romance - which has already endured several centuries - is disrupted by the arrival of her uncontrollable younger sister.
Title: Only Lovers Left Alive
Actors: Tom Hiddleston, Tilda Swinton, Mia Wasikowska, Anton Yelchin
tomatoConsensus: Worth watching for Tom Hiddleston and Tilda Swinton's performances alone, Only Lovers Left Alive finds writer-director Jim Jarmusch adding a typically offbeat entry to the vampire genre.
